classification.task_goal: Fix the errors in the train_pong_ai script and ensure it runs correctly.
primary_constraints: The PongGame class must inherit from gym.Env.
The observation_space must be an instance of gym.spaces.Space.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially provided incorrect guidance regarding the structure of the PongGame class and the observation_space. The user attempted to implement the suggestions but encountered further issues. The user actively sought corrections and made adjustments based on the AI's feedback, indicating a repair of constraints.
